modShortDescription: 3 different mods for the Auger/Chainsaw sounds that were modified in A19. No Hit Sounds, No Hit Sounds While Crouched and Reduced Hit Sounds While Crouched.
modDescription:
Mala Zedik has created 3 different mods for the Auger/Chainsaw [sounds](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-sound-mod/) that were modified in Alpha 19.

These are only intended as a temporary fix until The Fun Pimps split the audio properly. What I mean by this is, the Auger and Chainsaw are tied to the “Bullet Impact” sounds in game. Which means the [Auger/Chainsaw](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) “impact” sounds also affect any Bullet Impact sounds.

1. **No Hit Sounds** (Remove the Bullet Impact Sounds from Auger/Chainsaw/Guns)
2. **No Hit Sounds While Crouched** (0 Impact Sound generated when you are crouched)
3. **Reduced Hit Sounds While Crouched** (10% Impact Sound generated while you are crouched)

These are modlets, so they just need to be unziped in your Mods Folder to work.

If/When The Fun Pimps correct this issue while the mod is installed, the Auger/Chainsaws will start making the proper noises again, but the guns bullet impact will still be affect.

He also created a YouTube video showing the crouching mods in action if you are curious:

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1e-WOpvJ0SV3C5-a3iVKvccoC1TGoh7DZ)** No Hit Sounds  
**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1Dr88umlecyCuvabPpvNpz7s8o0g0m_Yi)** No Hit Sounds While Crouched  
**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1h7sbmbzMVON9QdVayW5MI3o6kpani4ha)** Reduced Hit Sounds While Crouched

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21614-removedlowered-auger-chainsaw-sounds-a19/).

**Credits:** Mala Zedik
